p:
The title compound was prepared using the procedure described in Example 86 replacing cyclopropylmethylamine with 2-methylthioethylamine.
1H NMR (CD30D, 400MHz) δ 8.99 (1H, dd, J=1.55 and 4.4Hz), 8.60 (2H, dd, J=1.55 and 8.5Hz), 7.69 (1H, dd, J=4.4 and 8.5Hz), 7.36 (2H, s), 7.35 (1H, d, J=1.8Hz), 4.63 (2H, s), 3.81 (2H, t, J=7.0Hz), 3.81 (2H, t, J=7.0Hz) and 2.10 (3H, s)ppm.
FAB MS calcd for C 19H 18Cl 2N 4O 2S 437.1 (MH +), found 437.0.
FAB HRMS exact mass calcd for C 19H 18Cl 2N 4O 2S 437.0601 (MH +), found 437.0610.
